name: Oliver Wyman
tagline: Financial services specialist—deep risk and actuarial expertise within Marsh McLennan
description: We guide clients through high-stakes decisions and transformative moments so they can adapt, grow, and thrive. Our edge? The power of perspective — driven by deep industry insight, specialized expertise, and a spirit of true collaboration.
known_for: Founded by former Booz Allen partners in 1984 as a financial services specialist. Known for rigorous analytical approach, deep actuarial expertise, and strong risk management capabilities. Part of Marsh McLennan—maintains specialized focus while resisting generalist diversification.
career_path: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Associate (2-3 yrs) → Engagement Manager (3-4 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Phone Screen (case + fit) → First Round (2 interviews: 1 case + 1 fit) → Final Round (3 interviews: 1 case + 1 written case + 1 fit)
recruiting.unique: Written case exercise in final round. Strong emphasis on financial services and risk management scenarios.
recruiting.timeline: Applications open July-August, rolling review. Process takes 2-3 months total, typically 14 days between steps. Interviews begin late August-October.

byu.tip: Small BYU presence—leverage financial services or actuarial background. Network with alumni in Boston and New York offices where financial services hiring is strongest.
